entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content: Hello WorldMy History of Hello World: Java: 2017/31234public static void main(string args[]){ System.out.println("Hello World!"); return 0;} C++: 2017/712345#include <iostream>int main(){ std::cout<<"Hello World!"; return 0;} C: 2017/712345#include <stdio.h>int main(){ printf("Hello World!"); return 0;} Javascript: 2017/71console.log("Hello World!") Python: 2017/81print("Hello World!") Matlab: 2017/91fprintf ("Hello World!") R: 2018/712helloWorld <- "Hello World!"print(helloWorld) $\kappa - 0$$EOF

entry.title: Set Up Your Github Blogs
entry.content: Set Up Your Github Blogs with HexoBasically github provided the personal pages which can host static webpage, and this is exactly the reason why I would try on the it.
